name: Joe Sanders
text: Yo you ready to kick butt at the tournament today?

name: Wade
text: Uh yeah sure. It'll be fun.

name: Joe Sanders
text: Totally. Say did you hear anything odd last night

name: Wade
text: No but yesterday did feel kind of...odd.

name: Joe Sanders
text: Yeah I heard like a weird crashing sound not to far away. It was by the abaoned train not too far away.

name: Wade
text: Hmmm...I might go take a look
